titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a tax credit for fuels produced from offshore deep-water projects.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1899)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a general business credit for fuels produced from offshore deep-water projects. Allows such credit to offset the minimum tax, with limitations.
